race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Pony Express 120’s 120 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Pony Express 120 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on kansas rolling farmland/prairie gravel to build confidence. Expect: kansas farmland/prairie, rolling gravel, 120-mile distance.
